description: This shell script schedules a reboot on a device based on firmware maintenance windows and logs. It reads configuration files, calculates a random time within the maintenance window, and updates the device's cron jobs to perform a reboot accordingly.

methods.name: calcRebootExecTime
methods.description: Calculates the random reboot execution time within the maintenance window considering device time offset.

methods.name: ScheduleCron
methods.description: Schedules the reboot cron job by updating the system crontab.
